name: Fantasy Monster Clicker
description:
Are you bored? Then step into the world of Fantasy Monster Clicker! Enjoy and explore a world full of upgrades, levels, monsters and bosses.

Game Features:

    Upgrades

  • Beat monsters and bosses and upgrade yourself with the coins you earn

    Diverse Chapters

  • Traverse between chapters with distinct themes, altering the look and feel of your gameplay. Each chapter introduces new monsters and surprises.

    Monsters

  • Battle against a thrilling array of monsters and bosses that will test your wit and clicker skills. Will you emerge victorious against these formidable foes?
In Fantasy Clicker Monster, you'll find enjoyment in upgrading and enhancing , all while exercising your clicker skills. Make upgrades and defeat stronger monsters and bosses
